adrFormatAddress: 48 Wall St Suite 1100, New York, NY 10005, USA

originalText.text: I was looking to buy a place in NYC moving from another state and it took me a while to settle on a location/neighborhood in the city. Artem was very patient through out, the communication was great, persistent but not pushy. He was able to negotiate  a great deal on the condo, getting me concession and discounts from the seller---he was also helpful in recommending a real estate attorney, mortgage broker, insurance broker etc.... all very helpful, since I was  not local. I would defiantly use again to buy or sale.

originalText.text: I used Arvik Group Real Estate on numerous transactions and I am extremely pleased with results. As an active investor, it is always great to work with a knowledgable and professional team who can deliver. Artem has been very helpful throughout the process.

text.text: I used Arvik Group Real Estate on numerous transactions and I am extremely pleased with results. As an active investor, it is always great to work with a knowledgable and professional team who can deliver. Artem has been very helpful throughout the process.

originalText.text:
I was looking into my very first investment property when I met Artem through a friend. Have to say, I didn't expect to find someone with comprehensive knowledge of the real estate market so quickly. Artem and his team not only provided me with valuable insights and guidance, but also took the time to understand my goals and preferences and were great at tailoring their recommendations according to my needs.
Thank you for your patience!  I highly recommend Arvik Group Real Estate to anyone seeking expert advice in the real estate market.

text.text:

originalText.text: The NYC real estate market can be tough to navigate these days. Finding the right broker/realtor can be just has tough. We’ve turned to the Arvik Group for help with our needs for commercial space both downtown and midtown Manhattan. Working with Elena and her team has been excellent so far.

text.text: The NYC real estate market can be tough to navigate these days. Finding the right broker/realtor can be just has tough. We’ve turned to the Arvik Group for help with our needs for commercial space both downtown and midtown Manhattan. Working with Elena and her team has been excellent so far.

originalText.text:
I had an exceptional experience working with Artem and Elena. From the beginning, their team displayed a deep understanding of the local market and my specific investment goals and provided me with a diverse range of properties.

I appreciate their transparency and honesty, they really made me feel confident in every step of the investment process. Very responsive, highly recommend them and will be working with them again.
